sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { ModalContainer, ModalBody, Text, Button, InjectedModalProps, LinkExternal, Flex, Image, Heading, Checkbox, Box, } from '@pancakeswap/uikit' import styled from 'styled-components' import { useTranslation } from 'contexts/Localization' import { useUserPredictionChartDisclaimerShow } from 'state/user/hooks' const Ul = styled.ul` color: ${({ theme }) => theme.colors.textSubtle}; list-style-position: outside; margin-left: 16px; & > li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; } ` const ChartDisclaimer: React.FC = ({ onDismiss }) => { const [showDisclaimer, setShowDisclaimer] = useUserPredictionChartDisclaimerShow() const { t } = useTranslation() const handleConfirm = () => { onDismiss() } return ( {t('Warning')}: {t('Prices shown on cards and charts are different')}: {t('The price you see come from difference places')}:
  • {t('Prices on cards come from Chainlink’s verifiable price oracle.')}
  • {t("Prices on charts come from Binance.com. Chart's are provided for your reference only.")}
{t("Only the price from Chainlink (shown on the cards) determines the round's result.")} {t('Learn More')} ) } export default ChartDisclaimer
